welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Koper, Slovenia! Nestled along the stunning Adriatic coast, our charming city is known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Koper has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portoroz Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Portoroz Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronchi Dei Legionari Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ronchi Dei Legionari Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours.
